title: What Makes Up a Character
text: Level, lineage, culture, class, stats, ties and backstory

rules.title: Level
rules.text: As your character grows more powerful and experienced you gain levels, unlocking new abilities based on your class. The current rules go from level 1-4.

rules.title: Lineage
rules.text: Your character's physiology. Visit the lineage section for a list of options.

rules.title: Culture
rules.text: Where your character grew up. Visit the culture section for a list of options

list.title: Mettle
list.text: The physical force a character can generate as well as their heartiness.

list.title: Agility
list.text: the physical accuracy and control of a character.

list.title: Intellect
list.text: The ability to gather and retain information.
